column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////I've tried mostly of the croissants/pastries! Kouign amann
column3: and the chocolate croissant are my favorites!! One of the only drawbacks in this place is that everything sells out so fast - if you really wanna see/try everything they have
column4: just show up as soon as they open. (Mind you
column6: some pastries are sold out already. You would think they'd bake more in the morning to increase their sales).
